name: Warhaos
description: Karekterini oluşturup yaratıkları kes, görevleri tamamla, deneyim kazan ve bir efsaneye dönüş!

name: Glory's Witness
description: "Glory's Witness" is a platform jump shooting game that supports attribute addition. You will play the AI intelligent robot that survived the last days, guided by the "God", and embark on an adventure to "witness the glory of human civilization".

name: Blasten!!
description: Blasten!! is a retro side-scrolling shooter with 6 stages of robot-busting action! Can you master all the robot power-ups and keep world peace?

name: Apoc Runner
description: As the world burns, as the streets crumble, you cling to one thing: survival. An unstoppable alien blight has taken hold of the earth, and there's no fighting it. Escape is the only option. Run, jump and slide your way through urban destruction in this intense platformer!

name: Waifu Love
description: Waifu Love is a casual puzzle game where you need to play puzzles like clicker, match game etc.

name: Hentai Nureta Puzzle College
description: Relaxing game with nice music, puzzle, and beautiful anime girls. Discover all the pictures and find out what they hide ?!

name: Drift Mania
description: Drift Mania is a 3d race focused on performing drift stunts and passing the track, competing with three other drivers in terms of the number of points accumulated.

name: Delta Light
description: Delta Light is a retro Arcade strategy/puzzle game where you draw lines to remove parts of the field while enemies try to stop you. Combine your speed and insight to out maneuver and puzzle your way around the enemies to complete the many levels! Pick it up and have a go!

name: ScreenSpace
description: Test your focus and reflexes in this simplistic clicking challenge!

name: Carotic: Academic Version
description: Carotic is a top-down 3D couch-co-op hide-and-seek game for 2-4 players. Each player plays the role of a car in a very busy city. Their task is to drive like the other NPC cars while trying to identify the other players. In order to gain points the other players must be destroyed by dashing into them.

name: Warrior Bloodline: Path of Survival
description: An epic journey of the fellowship of the children bonded by blood, escaped an experimental camp, wandering the woods and struggling both to survive and to reveal their destiny. An immersive, story-driven exploration game with a strong focus on realistic survival.

name: Men Bang
description: It’s time to let your imagination run wild with the steamiest Dating Sim/ Clicker on this side of town! With scenarios so mouth-watering, a wide variety of unique hunks, and a fantastic retro artwork and atmosphere, Men Bang has everything you need to fulfill your deepest and wildest desires!

name: Captain Edgar Giza
description: Captain Edgar Giza is a lightning-fast fusion of the FPS and action genres. Use your agility and combat skills to survive, and solve the mystery of Giza. As the only soldier sent from our world after a discovery at Giza, you find yourself fighting to get rid of deadly creatures. Become Captain Edgar with detailed graphics, intense first-person action and incredible mechanics.

name: The Legend of Arcadieu 2
description: A sexy RPG adventure in a magical world filled with beautiful girls! Part two!

name: 100 Hidden Eternals
description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Black and white hand-drawn style. Animated puzzles. Mind blown.

name: Automation
description: PLC Ladder Logic programming simulator.

name: Do 11
description: Find a way out of the Do 11 app by doing missions that come from the mysterious Do 11 app. A choice awaits you to solve puzzles and change the fate of the protagonist. Escape the main character from the Do 11 app while savoring a profound worldview and intriguing story. An incredible twist awaits.

name: Pizza Bike Rider
description: Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time. Be aware the road is full of fast moving vehicles.Come Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out.

name: Furgal's Jetpack
description: Furgal's Jetpack is a 2D runner with a side view. You are unjustly imprisoned, and your goal is to escape! Fly over cars and Dodge flying clubs to get to the desired freedom, because the only way to it is through the thorns of the urban jungle.

name: Roopit and Boopit
description: A Cartoony, Co-Op, Puzzle Game with a Quirky Charm!

name: Gardens and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Live Empire 2
description: This is a simulation game.

name: Zero Plan
description: 《依澪》是一款恐怖解谜像素游戏。在游戏中玩家将操控谜之少女”澪“或神秘男人”玖“ ，在这个怪物横行的意识世界里找到世界崩坏的真相并生存下去。

name: My Cute Commissar
description: My Cute Commissar – satyrical historical visual novel with “match-3” type of gameplay. Take part in the political struggle in the 1920’s communist Russia and prevent Stalin’s tyranical rule!

name: The Doors of Trithius
description: The Doors of Trithius is a RPG roguelike set in a randomly generated fantasy world. Level your skills and overcome your foes as you traverse the mysterious world of Enalia.

name: Prometheus OS
description: A text-based detective puzzle game

name: Seclusion Sword
description: Sin descripción

name: Devil, It's me
description: Devil, It’s me is a game where you can build your own castle to defend against the waves of heroes set forth to defeat Magrandes.

name: Mini Maker: Make A Thing
description: A hero thing, a monster thing, a robo thing… in Mini Maker, you can make any ‘thing’! Use an arsenal of plastic limbs, wonky tools, rainbow stickers and googly eyes to assemble creations, please demanding clients, and laugh in the face of perfectionism.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: 1944 - The Loop Master
description: Add 1944 - The Loop Master - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! The year is 1944, and the whole world is embroiled in a massive battle. Take to the skies in a P-38 Lightning or an A6M Zero and bring this long war to an end!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Street Fighter II - Hyper Fighting
description: Add STREET FIGHTER II' - Hyper Fighting - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Twelve fighters battle it out to see who will be the world's greatest, but the fight is heating up against the four bosses of Shadaloo. Featuring new fighters and the new Turbo feature, this time the fight's even more exciting!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Warriors of Fate
description: Add WARRIORS OF FATE to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Join the great warriors once again! The five heroes of the Three Kingdoms set forth to triumph in the Battle of Red Cliffs!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Cyberbots - Fullmetal Madness
description: Add CYBERBOTS - FULLMETAL MADNESS - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! The roar of the engines, the clash of steel: orchestrate your own dramatic robot battles with the massive robot soldiers known as VAs (Variant Armor).

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Captain Commando
description: Add CAPTAIN COMMANDO to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Commandos, move out! Defeat the Super Criminals lead by Dr. Scumocide!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Super Street Fighter II Turbo
description: Add SUPER STREET FIGHTER II TURBO to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Sixteen fighters in their prime gather to answer one question: who is the strongest? With new super combos and lightning-fast turbo speed, the fight takes on new heights!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: 19XX - The War Against Destiny
description: Add 19XX - The War Against Destiny - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! The year is 19XX, and humanity is embroiled in an endless conflict with the mysterious enemy, Outer Limits. Two pilots take flight on a perilous journey into enemy territory to stop the untold destruction once and for all.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Giga Wing
description: Add Giga Wing to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Another war has broken out over the most powerful of the Medallions, stones said to be sent from heaven. Four pilots, who each carry their own stones with mysterious powers, take flight to the battlefield.

name: Withdrawn
description: A game about loneliness in adulthood. Withdrawn is a hand-drawn point-and-click interactive fiction where you're following the main character's routine, thoughts, memories and his constant fear of living.

name: Beyond Eden: Dear Edward
description: Spun off from 'Beyond Eden', 'Beyond Eden: Dear Edward' is a Boys’ Love Life simulation game starring Edward, a naïve young aristocrat. Hone his skills as detective, psychic, or gambler, seek fortune and adventure in the streets and salons of 1890s London, and romance two desirable young men!

name: Future Girls
description: When two women come back in time to see you, Is the future in the balance? No just your love life in this adult romantic visual novel with just a little bit of time travel.

name: Half-Fly3
description: Play as the Fly in a physics based,colorful,rogue-lite world where Cakes and Cherries fall from the sky. Don't let them turn your head. Falling into the dark abyss they back to you as... simple Bomb,Curse or something more powerful.

name: Zynet
description: ZYNET is a fresh retro sci-fi action VR game that redefines what VR gameplay can be. Toss, swipe, punch, take control, dodge, and think your way through a mysterious and dangerous alternate dimension.

name: Cairo Stark: Crocs Hunter
description: Cairo Stark: Crocs Hunter is a game full of incredible adventures with bright three-dimensional characters and a mysterious colorful world. Stop the invasion of Crocosaurus!

name: As Aventuras do Cueca Listrada
description: The story of the game was inspired by the imagination we have during childhood, where small challenges become great achievements, using a character based on a real-life child. Grab fruits and candies to save time, watch out for enemies and go through maps

name: Gan's Matchstick Men: Deadly Rhythm
description: Matchstick Men: Deadly rhythm is a local multiplayer fighting game. Use strange mechanics to blow your opponents.(Temporary multiplayer is not supported)

name: Shape Arena
description: Shape Arena is a local multiplayer 2D game in which players control skillfully illustrated geometric shapes on a chalkboard, fighting to collect all the candies and achieve the highest score.

name: Fred the Rubber Ducky
description: Help Fred navigate through the world in his search for destiny, where danger lies around the corner in each of the 8 unique handcrafted and challenging levels.

name: Olden: Card Game
description: Olden: Card Game is an online multiplayer (1v1) turn based game in which players need to harvest 300 value points from their own cards while not allowing opponent to do the same. Both players share the same deck and have only one move per turn

name: VectorBall
description: VectorBall is a multiplayer dodgeball inspired game. Throw balls and move out of the way of incoming balls, this is a fast paced game with easy to understand mechanics. Throw a damage ball to kill another player. If you want to move, throw a teleport ball, or dodge by moving in your play area.

The year is 9001. Humanity has spread across the stars. While the masses suffer in absolute poverty, the wealthy elite use their incredible resources to genetically engineer themselves into something more than mere mortals. The galaxy is now ruled by these tyrants. Can you defeat them?

name: Fire Protection Training Simulator
description: This Fire Protection Training Simulator was designed and developed to provide employers, of any size, with the most cost-effective method of verifying their employees understanding of fires, how they're started, how to prevent them and how to properly respond in the event of one.

name: Horse Riding Deluxe 2
description: Horse Riding Deluxe 2 is almost all about horses. You can buy, tame, train, feed, and personalize horses. A number of quests and racetracks await you in the huge open world.

name: Smashroom
description: The faith of the forest is threatened by evil forces. A mysterious curse has turned your human body into a small mushroom and your world is invaded by molds, but not all is lost. Your new form comes with new abilities!

name: Zerowood
description: Zerowood is a 2D action game, where you play as a young man who has to save his parents from dangerous aliens. Use various weapons and fighting techniques to become the hero in this special action game.

name: Palallel
description: Palallel is a 2D cooperative puzzle platformer for two players. You are stuck in a board where you can’t see your partner. You need to exchange objects, trigger mechanisms, and more to escape.

name: Forsaken Spire
description: Forsaken Spire is an untethered physics-based climbing game. You see it, you climb it: however you can!

name: Rockin' Road
description: Rockin' Road is our love letter to Road Rash, FlatOut and other cool arcade racing games.

name: Magical Swordmaiden: Riru's Grand Adventure
description: After receiving a letter from her brother about strange events happening in his town, Tanya, along with her apprentice Riru, travel to Cain village to investigate.

name: InfiniWordSlide
description: Inspired by the *tris family of games as well as the word search of the world, InfiniWordSlide gives you a score attack that will test your knowledge of the language, your ability to quickly react and reward good strategy. The controls are simple and the mechanics clear.

name: UpBoll
description: UpBall is a game of climbing up by controlling the speed of time Each death will not reset the level or let you start over If you are unskilled, then stop the time and think about what to do next The game is inspired by “SUPERHOT”

name: 孙美琪疑案 第二季
description: The sequel to the original indie game "Sun Meiqi" was created by the original team. Innovative logical reasoning gameplay, combined with real 3D interaction. The horrible reasoning puzzle game, all the clues are in front of you, but no one knows the bottom of the mystery.

name: Punk A.F.
description: Punk A.F. is a gorgeous and brutal hand-drawn old-school vertical-scrolling 2D shooter game set in the alternate timeline of 197X. Join the Punk Air Force, a rebel team of extreme special-ops pilots violently uprising against corrupt politicians and their greedy corporate overlords.

name: Nairi: Rising Tide
description: The story continues in the highly anticipated second chapter of NAIRI. In this graphic adventure, Nairi pushes onward on a perilous quest to save her family, leaving the Tower of Shirin's grimy slums behind in this exciting all-new sequel!

name: Hack or Die!
description: The Hacky-Sack Platformer! Keep the ball air-born while you kick your way through sprawling levels. Use unique kicking mechanics to rescue your best friend Kevin the dog. Just DONT DROP IT!!!

name: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II
description: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II is a sequel of Steel Alcimus inspired by various 1980-1990s' 3D computer games. Pilot the deadliest helicopter in this action-packed 3D game. Destroy the targets, rescue the hostages, and capture the enemy buildings to save the world!

name: Lucid: A Game About Dreams
description: In a small fishing village in Sápmi - the land of the midnight sun - Leif’s life as a cowardly, lonely & boring accountant is coming to an end. He has nothing to lose except the dreams he is suddenly remembering. This is where you come in...

name: Changeling Tale
description: Fantasy and reality collide in Changeling Tale, a story-rich visual novel about finding one's "true" self... and true love! Help a young man returning from war rebuild his life, kindle new romances, and reveal a secret that will forever transform the lives of those closest to him - literally!
YOU ARE A SQUARE. That can fight, drink, dance, lift, become an athlete, play darts, fight robots, rob, steal, and smoke weed. All to get the global high score.

name: Robot Fight
description: Robot Fight is what it looks like. A simple, funny "board game". Fast play with 1-2 minutes per round. The realy play with friends game. The feeling of life, when we laugh together about ourselves and our friends. Of course, it is spiced with the words "how can you be have a such of luck".

name: KillSteel
description: Kill as many cars as you can in this action-packed free student game!

name: Othello Let's Go
description: Othello Let's Go is a beautifully designed strategy board game for all ages. A total of 8 levels of computer AI difficulty, suits for both beginners and experts! More than 100 carefully selected Endgame and Lights Out levels are waiting for you to solve!

name: Cosmos
description: COSMOS is a difficult platformer shooter where you fight through fast-paced vertical levels with the use of wall running and precise gunplay.

name: Box Nation
description: Box Nation [ ] is a sandbox kind of game. In this box world, you can become a leader of your own nation. Your main goal in the game is to create and develop your nation of boxes.

name: MidNights of Desperado
description: The protagonist of this lonely life is you. You leave your hometown and come to a strange world. The world is prosperous and cold, strange but real. You may like it or wish you could tear it to pieces. The good news is, you have the choice!

name: Futuball: Future Football Manager Game
description: Clone the best football stars and manage your dream team.

name: Warren the Warlock
description: Get ready to venture out as Warren, the ominous-looking warlock. Hurl your magic orb, invert gravity for yourself, and phase shift through walls. Fight your way to the leader of the invading horde in hopes of liberating your realm.

name: The Universe
description: Feel like you are in space ! This application has been created in a photorealistic way, you will feel like you are on Mars, Jupiter, Mercury ... and ISS ! The best education game. If you like astronomy this is your application. You will feel that you are in space observing the entire universe.

name: Netaboku: A robot girl changes my life as a bedridden boy
description: This game is a sci-fi romantic adventure(visual novel) modeled after the avatar robot cafe. Japan, circa 2040. Kanto lives in a residential facility for the severely physically disabled. One day, they meet a mysterious girl, Kanata, and their destiny changes dramatically...

name: Methods: The Detective Competition
description: One hundred detectives compete against each other in a crime-solving competition.

name: Deskmate Girl
description: Can you become a perfect boyfriend and let your girlfriend open her heart to you?

name: Future Fragments
description: Travel to a threatening future and seek the fragments of a powerful weapon to defend your kingdom. Future Fragments is an adults-only, modern take on a platformer with genre-bending gameplay, full english voicework and a branching storyline with choices that actually matter.

name: Project BioRisk
description: Survive the nightmare in this multiplayer cooperative survival horror experience.

name: Miss Neko 2
description: Welcome to the magic island — Nekoland! All good things you want will happen here! Solve the match puzzles, collect the magic coins and then you will see miracles!

name: Space Train
description: What if there was a train, in space? Embark as a simple passenger or take a longer-term role as a member of staff in an asymmetric gaming experience like no other.

name: Solar Baron
description: As head of an interplanetary corporation, your goal is to extract resources from across the solar system and bring them home faster and cheaper than your competitors. Construct trade depots and colonies. Build rockets and spaceports. Master realistic orbital mechanics and maximize profits.

name: Spot Sample Witness Simulator
description: This Spot Sample Witnessing Simulator provides the user (trainee) with the opportunity to use and demonstrate their understanding of the Purge, Fill and Empty Method for collecting gas pipeline samples.

name: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room
description: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room is an interactive movie based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. Starring Georgia Hirst (Five Dates, Vikings) and Marcus Fraser (Transformers: The Last Knight)

name: MyCompany996
description: 在《我的公司996》中，你会遇到各种典型职场人物和职场事件，公司危机四伏，如果想要保住饭碗，你需要“机灵点”，与同事维护好关系，哄的老板心花怒放，更快升职、加薪。当然，游戏里可以自由选择，你可以另辟蹊径，制霸职场…… 20余种迥异的大结局，近百种成就，等待你来解锁。

name: Southern cross Battle force
description: This is a horizontal retro arcade-style STG shooting game. Players need to control fighters to defeat the ultimate villain FightFox and rescue EAU and the Southern Cross Union headquarters.

name: Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse
description: Brutal, obscure, and punishing action-adventure roguelite with a dark atmosphere and gothic hand-drawn graphic novel art.

name: Elemental Defenders TD
description: A Tower Defense where the Towers are moving around the enemies. With over 200 towers and endless mode. There is almost infinite strategies.

name: Verz
description: The game is a Virtual reality experience where the player will experience escape room styled levels. Each tier of levels will have a different theme and puzzles to be solved.

name: Invisible Man
description: A story about a man turned invisible by an experiment. Explore the mysterious facility and escape it.

name: Silver Whistle
description: Adjutant Chuanfang Shuei, defeated in battle, flees to the city of Harmudis. To repay for saving her life, she starts helping Duke Chonghua Zeng to find a legendary treasure.

name: Vixen Wars
description: You are the Prince of Kinky Kingdom and must ascend the throne after the death of your father, the King. This ascension is interrupted when the Dark Magician corrupts your step-sister to the dark side!

name: Tactical Warfare Simulator
description: It's the War to End All Wars and you have joined the ranks of the new breed of soldier, the fighter pilot.

name: MushrooMonster
description: MushrooMonster is a first-person survival horror game. You arrived at the forest island tonight to fight the evil mushroom monster. There is only one way to kill the monster - that is to collect 12 mushrooms and burn them in a bonfire.

name: Virtual telescope
description: Get the star sky that is above you and visit other planets in the virtual reality!

name: Zeliria Sanctuary II: Xinori Asylum
description: The adventures of Maxx, Humkey and their friends continue! Is Zeliria really a kind of sanctuary? Who invaded the empty planet, failing to wake the absolute weapon sleeping in its bowels? The continuation of the fascinating history Zeliria Sanctuary is already waiting for you!

name: Get Out...
description: As you are the Bad Father who killed his daughter, you must to get out of your home, Before you die...

name: Réel Futur
description: This package contains two games for the price of one.

name: Small War
description: You need to choose your camp and build the building! Build combat units through barracks and factories, and then manipulate combat units to destroy enemy bases!

name: Infinite Way
description: Infinite Way is a deck-building roguelike where you travel, fight and survive in post apocalyptic world.

name: Happy Oshare Time
description: Happy Oshare Time is an idol VR game where you can dress up, perform in rhythm-game concerts and do photoshoots! Try performing with your friends using multiplayer mode!

name: Hyperbolica
description: Hyperbolica is a whimsical Non-Euclidean adventure with mind-bending worlds full of games, puzzles, mazes, and secrets! Immerse yourself in reality-warping geometries where lines can never be parallel, horizons are curved, and space grows exponentially.

name: Stalker
description: The background story of "Stalker" is that a teenager encounters various events on the road following a young girl. The teenager(player) can selectively interact and give repairs / help due to these events. How you will lead to different ending. The game was developed during the Global Game Jam 2020.

name: Chaos Combat Chess
description: Welcome to Chaos Combat Chess, a competitive 8v8 auto chess battle royale!

name: Only One Rectangle
description: Platformer with a variety of disorienting gameplay for an interesting gaming experience. A lot of colors, invisible painted platforms, traps, various puzzles.

name: Raivo
description: Collect a team of robots called Raivos. These highly advanced creatures are quick at learning. They start with no knowledge, so everything they learn, through advanced machine learning, they learn from you. Enter your Raivos in an online arena fight against Raivos trained by other players.

name: The Epsilon Outcome
description: A dry-humored, sci-fi interactive story where you interact with characters, work with objects, and complete puzzles to solve the mystery of why a major science experiment went wrong.

name: The Curse of Kubel
description: An earthquake swallows up the city of Kaldesta and splits it into two. Now many adventurers travel there in search of treasure. However, a curse suddenly appears and starts infecting the adventurers...

name: Spectrum
description: Spectrum is a short puzzle platformer about color in a dull world. Explore over 100+ levels of tight, puzzle-platforming to become the king of all colors. Switch colors to interact with a multitude of mechanics that allow for deep, complex interaction.

name: Missy's Transformation Tournament
description: Rogue-lite meets single-player battle royale! Enter Missy's Transformation Tournament! Preserve your humanity at all costs! Defeat the other contestants by transforming them into submission. Survive in a dynamic arena where anything could be a threat. Will you lose yourself to Missy's power?

name: I Walk Among Zombies Vol. 3
description: Gunfire rings out, shattering the safe haven of the town hall. Violent death. People driven to suicide. A mystery group behind the scenes. An imminent horde of zombies. And the intelligent zombies are finally on the move. What will become of Yuusuke and the others?

name: Splash King's Tournament
description: Splash King's Tournament is an exhilarating, fast paced tournament style multiplayer battle royale, third person shooter game for PC.

name: Isle Vatra
description: Isle Vatra is a mysterious island surrounded by dangerous sealife. When a research station goes silent, you're send to the island to investigate.

name: P.A.I.N.T.
description: In this cooperative third-person shooter, you take control of the P.U.N.K.’s. Rebels that shoot their way through an evil factory with high-powered paint blasters. Sabotage the tyrannical corporation and fight your way through their factory to achieve the highest chaos score!

name: Domino Simulator
description: Domino Simulator is a physics-based sandbox game in which you place various domino tiles and pieces to construct domino chains. Enjoy the odd satisfaction of watching your creation fall one after the other. Ultimately, the floor is yours to fill and the how and the what is completely up to you.

name: DockYard
description: Bad physics meets first game project. Dockyard! It's a game. Best send it to your friend as a joke. At least they'll get a good laugh out of it.

name: System Invaders
description: Experience waves upon waves of viruses that have infected your computer. 5 Chapters with over 125 Waves of enemies! Play with your friends in local or online co-op! Can you destroy all the viruses?

name: Hero Mini Maker
description: Build fantasy miniatures using over 800 stylized parts. Export them as STL files for 3D printing, or use one of our online 3D printing partners to bring your creations to life.

name: Successor of the Key
description: A shooting game where a beautiful girl defeats enemies using magic.

name: Microodyssey
description: Microodyssey is a narrative-driven 2D platform game, representing a travel into the greater scientific question: what there is at the start and at the end of everything?

name: SwordBall
description: SwordBall is a free to play 2D sword fighting football game. Football meets fencing? Join your team in the most exciting, fast paced game! Swing your sword and defend your goal or grab the ball and score. Lead your team to victory and join the future of sports!

name: Cubecois
description: Cubecois is a fast and challenging arcade style game with great music. You can choose various skins and upgrades for your mission!

name: Shoot Covid-19
description: Let's try our covid-19 shooting game. In the game, you need to clear all kinds of monsters infected by pneumonia virus in the infirmary, and finally eliminate all the viruses to reach the destination.

name: Chaos Groove
description: CHAOS GROOVE! Classic fast-paced, over-the-top fighting action, featured with upgraded HD 2D Sprites, online play (RollBack Netcode), ground-breaking effects, and a dynamic system that earns points for unlockable goodies. Fight like a hero, play like a legend!

name: Nyxx
description: A classic 2d bullet hell shoot'em'up.

name: Wolfie's Break Out
description: A retro-inspired brick breaker game that takes players on a nostalgic trip down memory lane. With its classic arcade-style graphics and upbeat chiptune soundtrack, the game is designed to transport players back to the golden age of video gaming.

name: Dark Solitaire: Mystical Circus
description: Visit the weird circus now! Open the mystery world to yourself!

name: Other Realms
description: Dwarven based survival multiplayer game, craft, build your kingdom piece by piece. Set foundations, forge devices and conquer your dwarven realm.

name: Supreme AI: Arena
description: A minimalistic, fast-paced top-down arena shooter against a state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. Fight AI agents whose speed, tactics, gunplay control and obsession to win have been trained for years of virtual playtime and now delivered to you in 60-seconds-long battles.

name: Alek: The Lost Kingdom
description: Alek, the young man who will change Zarabon's World forever. In this adventure, you must rebuild the world of Zarabon in your image. Build villages and manage your production lines with the help of your villagers.

name: Not An Angels: Erotic Puzzle
description: Not an Angels is a puzzle game with a beautiful graphics, relaxing music and erotic content.

name: Cyber Fight Challenge
description: CFC is a sporting simulator developed for PC, the basic concept is participation in contests under the professional boxing rules

name: SGS Afrika Korps
description: The game recreates the campaigns and battles of Erwin ‘Desert Fox’ Rommel’s legendary Afrika Korps, in Libya between 1941 and 1942. Play the Axis forces to conquer the most valuable prize of all: the Suez Canal. Or command the 8th Army soldiers, the famous Desert Rats, to repel the invaders.

name: Metal Banana
description: The forest was invaded by an army of robots! Use your skill to help Monkee, Donkee, Tinkee and Pinkee save the day. Metal Banana brings classic elements of arcade games in a new title full of action and colors.

name: Outside the Grid
description: Imagine that you are in prison. Not everyone can escape from the hands of justice, you need to have an IQ above average. Blow up, destroy, hide, kill, evolve - all this can be done in the game Outside the Grid. But do not forget about Kerbalai, help him finally find peace!

name: Oneiro
description: Utilize skill, creativity, and knowledge to reach the depths of your mental labyrinth. By collecting and stacking items, gears, and weapons, you'll stand a chance against the brutal manifestations of your fears.

name: Spookyard
description: Spookyard is a local 2D multiplayer computer game that has different and competitive dynamics for each arena, offering game modes that can vary within the topdown and sidescroll camera styles.

name: Watcher Chronicles
description: Become a glutton for punishment and persevere against 20+ merciless bosses and legions of skeletal nightmares in this savage yet charming 2D souls-like.

name: Frag Grounds
description: Immerse yourself in the classic military shooter experience or obliterate your foes with state-of-the-art, prototype equipment such as plasma rifles, remotely controlled mechs or with some good ol' tanks and attack helicopters in this dynamic FPS.

name: Hentai Balloons
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Keep the Balance
description: Ever throw an elephant on a scale? Or chased an elephant away with a hair dryer? It's very easy. But always: KEEP THE BALANCE!

name: Railroads & Catacombs
description: Travel through this hostile land gone mad aboard your ancient train. Choose wisely where to stop for resources and supplies and try to survive in this original Turn-Based Roguelike Game. How far will you go?

name: Frog Detective 3: Corruption at Cowboy County
description: You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve a mystery in the wild west.

name: Smutty Scrolls
description: An erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself - at the same time! You're a sexy slime hero... Change the outcome of your story in real time! Explore the Smutty Scrolls, find legendary items and stay alive to date and pleasure all the girls!

name: Unstoppable Man
description: Fire started!

name: Zombase
description: Survive through progressively harder waves and build defences to protect your respawn orb! Post Apocalyptic Zombie Survival Builder. Build defenses! Blast zombies! Have fun! Perfect for any gamer! As always, HAVE FUN!

name: Pixel Fixer
description: Restore 100 pictures, which were accidentally shredded. Click and drag the rows, and the will be glued when you release them so that they fit together. You can zoom the pixels to see how they fit, and you can choose 7 difficulty levels to find the best amusing challenge.

name: Super Circuit Breakers
description: Back with new weapons, new enemies, and with more circuits to break than ever! Destroy millions of robots in this free-to-play shooter with up to 6 players.

name: The Curse of Feldar Vale
description: Can your party lift the curse that has befallen the once peaceful Vale? An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-3, loosely based on Dungeons and Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

name: Nibiru Voyage
description: Nibiru Voyage is a classic scrolling game with weapon upgrades and hordes of enemy ships.

name: Offcoast
description: The rogue-like strategy game Offcoast takes place in a subterranean, underwater landscape.

name: Ace Campus Club
description: Receiving a call from your lawyer, and was informed that if you are capable of leading the campus‘s club to become the most popular ones, you will inherit a large sum of money. With the rare chance to finally stepping out, there will be money, and even girls.

name: Flash Snooker Game
description: Play the best Online Snooker Game, with Rankings, Stats, Tournaments every few hours, Game bets and Cue Upgrades. Practice or Play other Snooker players from all over the world. Quick and easy game play with realistic physics.

name: Disgrace
description: Disgrace is an action adventure game that can certainly require a lot of thinking from the player. Done intentionally so as not to be too intuitive, the player will have to rely on their observation and deductions in order to progress in the game.

name: The Mystic
description: The Mystic is a dark fantasy, turn-based strategy game. Become a follower of the first gods, gain their favour, overthrow the High King by innovative combat and magic systems and establish harmony. The game offers an exciting campaign full of twists, battles and difficult decisions and multiplayer.

name: Professional Team
description: The popular global coffin carrying culture is coming. Many different coffin carrying heroes, DIY coffin system. Come and hold an unforgettable funeral for him in your heart!

name: Blured Angel
description: Blured Angel is a kind of somatosensory game that uses a camera on a Windows host to capture and interact with each other. It weaves a heaven I see from the spiritual world of the Bible from the perspective of a not so smart but persistent angel "Mehoo".

name: Ephemera
description: Guide your character through it all, from their birth to their last breath. Make sure they remember you.

name: The Book of Distance
description: The Book of Distance blends techniques from mechanical sculpture, film, and stage to redefine personal storytelling in virtual reality. Family archives add a haunting layer of realism. 2D and 3D hand-crafted sets reminiscent of Japanese woodblock prints, evocative character design, and seamless choreography combine with surprising moments of interaction to gently whisk us across the ocean and through the years.

name: Space Avengers
description: A modern remake of classic vertical scrollers which were popular in the arcades of the 1980s. Control a spaceship with directional keys or WASD, and shoot rockets upwards with the Space key. Destroy incoming waves of alien spaceships and dodge rockets they fire at you!

name: Celestial Reactors
description: A virtual reality experience where you explore mysterious landscapes and meet the entities inhabiting it.

name: Whone
description: Collect the Hidden Gems, Survive the Treacherous Levels, and Upgrade Your Abilities as You Jump Your Way to Victory! But WATCH-OUT, if You Touch the Ground, You DIE!

name: Bowsette
description: Bowsette, the monster queen in the forest, found that her men were beginning to rebel. Bowset decided to teach them a lesson and let them know who was the real owner.

name: 勇者的十日人生
description: Sin descripción

name: Rise of the Overlords
description: Rise of the Overlords is a combination of TCG and war board games, bringing new depth and giving new strategies to the players. Place your units wisely and take advantage of the battlefield to defeat your opponents. Who will be the Supreme Overlord that will rule the world? A new era begins!

name: Hentai Fantasy
description: Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Keep the Keep
description: Test your problem-causing skills with this strategic multiplayer puzzle. Build towers and destroy your Opponent's Keep via fast-paced turn-based combat that leaves all the tedious parts behind. Solve riddles solo or create some for your friends online!

name: Queen of the Pack
description: After being bitten, Farrah is thrust into a world of half-wolves and other creatures she never knew existed. Now she must learn to either embrace her new life as a member of the pack, or remain a human.

name: Whacky Golf
description: Battle your friends in a chaotic game of mini-golf with up to 4 players. Whack and steal to get the lowest score you can. Just watch your back!

name: Tyrania: A Kinetic Visual Novel
description: Tyrania is a kinetic visual novel, meaning a text-based game with a one ending linear story. The story is focused on the opposition of two different ideas of Justice when dealing with crime and terrorism.

name: Apprehend: Girlfriend
description: Apprehend;Girlfriend is a Yuri Visual Novel about two young women living together under the same roof.

name: Energy Island Corp.
description: Build and manage an electric grid ! At the start of the day, build new infrastructure and plan your day. Once ready, start the day then watch electricity production / consumption in real time to adjust your buildings settings. The growth of the islands depends on you !

name: Knockdown the Ball Twice
description: Meet the most annoying ball rolling game!

name: Aspiring Light
description: The world is a messed up place. But it's all a blip on the radar to Aiden, who's got his own problems to worry about. Things like, what the answer to that last math problem was. Trying to keep his friendships afloat before it's too late. And just wondering what the future has in hold for him...

name: Free Solo: One Life
description: An endurance rhythm game that only gives you only One Life to simulate the danger of Free Solo Climbing.

name: No-Zero
description: The last fortress is victory and death.

name: Education
description: Having done some terrible things in his youth at school, his memories call Bart Blake back to that place, in his nightmares.

name: Synonym
description: Synonym is an atmospheric puzzle game with mechanics inspired by mimicry. Manipulate blocks that will copy your position, height and rotation.

name: The Un-Beatable Game
description: A game you probably won't beat, but why don't you try?

name: Beyond Polaris Guardian
description: Beyond Polaris Guardian is a action-rpg and TPS on a flexible campaign system with different stories. Incarne 3 unique characters and develop your personal story thanks to the innovative Galactic Network system.

name: Eat the Wounded
description: This is a zombie survival open world game with voxel mechanics, crafting and building components.

name: Shadows on the Vatican: Nightingale
description: Writing on a blog and using her obscure ability, the mysterious Nightingale has been helping people in danger for years. Now, she’s forced to disappear, facing threats from a killer... one of those people she helped in the past. An interactive short story featuring an advanced navigation UI.

name: Cookie Space
description: This is an arcade adventure shooter set in a "?closed?" space. Your task in the role of a tiny spaceship is to shoot asteroids (very similar to cookies) to clear the space around.

name: Sleeping Beauty
description: You're walking by the riverside and notice an unconscious girl. You do everything you can to wake her up but fail to do so. Then, you notice a stranger jewel on her neck and take it... only to get involved in an erotic quest to save the kingdom!

name: Sachie: Death Road
description: Can you survive for 7 days? Japanese horror developed by the Japanese indie team

name: Page One
description: A beach, a house, the howling rain and a mystery to uncover. Playable in both desktop and VR take control of the first chapter of this 360 degree hand drawn adventure.

name: Neko Chan
description: Neko Chan is the exclusive desktop elf of the STEAM platform, placing her on your desktop to accompany you through every day of your life and work.

name: 傻瓜式SGB粗陋心得
description: This is an experimental RPG, which is used to test the author's mastery of the development tool smile game build (SGB) and experience steam's launch process. All materials come from the software itself and DLC, except two ending texts and a modified cover.

name: Misuto
description: Hip Hop Samurai Action with stylish combat and relaxing environments. A wandering samurai gets lost in a mist, but it's not as simple as it looks at first glance. Can you find the way out?

name: Rou Niu Yang Zhi Ji Hua
description: Sin descripción

name: The Whisperer
description: Explore an abandoned trading post and solve a complex puzzle to investigate the terrible secret it holds. The Whisperer is a short story-driven point & click game set in Lower Canada at the beginning of the 19th century.

name: Crimson Glaive Sigma
description: Enjoy this 2D metroidvania-like bullet hell platformer. Jump, dodge and traverse using your jet pack. Find weapons and abilities. Fight bosses and escape an old space station drifting through the cosmos. You are alone, with nothing but a space suit and a gun. Just keep going! Persevere and triumph!

name: Tales of Kongfu
description: Sin descripción

name: Shape
description: A first-person puzzle game where you explore a maze and your identity.

name: Tube Tussle
description: Prove your pool party prowess in this family-friendly battle royale! Grab your tube and water sprayers to push your friends into oil spots to knock them out. But keep your eyes peeled not to push yourself into danger as well.

name: Signs of Zodiac
description: Simple rest puzzle line game You just need to move your finger to unlock the beautiful constellation No special background story, just simple jigsaw and appreciation Relax yourself

name: Brawler
description: Classic beat 'em up action brawling in gang-infested streets.

name: Urban Street Fighter
description: Hardcore beat'em up game

name: Penny's Path
description: In this voice-acted, hand-painted visual novel about women and witchcraft, a brush with the coronavirus sends Penny back in time to the New England witch hunts. As Penny meets strong female characters who challenge past and present stereotypes, she discovers her own special role in the changing seasons of time.

name: Truzzle
description: Take the ball to the end, without interruptions.

name: Hell Pages
description: The doors to hell have been opened. The Earth has become a battlefield among 10 infernal armies. Bael, the most feared among all demons, set out in an insane crusade to conquer the Earth for himself in this scrolling shooter game, with 10 stages with plenty of action, violence and blood.

name: 100 Hidden Birds
description: Hidden object game in the cartoon city style. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: Soup!
description: Soup! – This is a simple but addictive puzzle game, you just need to find the same items to cope with the mess and open the drawing.

name: The Sand Dunes
description: The Sand Dunes is an action game with shooter and bullet hell elements in which you will fight to save the remains of your people. The ancient Gods have been corrupt and they must rest.

name: Fast Typing Master
description: Learn typing with Fast Typing Master and find how fast you can type. The app has a rich set of free typing lessons with options like hard/normal/easy. You can become a typing master with the help of this game.

name: Hakoniwa Sumo
description: Sumo simulation game

name: Shades of Sakura
description: This is a casual strategy game - Shades of SakuraThe player will have a fascinating journey through ancient Japan, the game has 4 Main Heroines, wonderful mechanics and an interesting plot. The player needs to draw lines and connect the balls together.

name: Space Alpha
description: Fight in single - or multiplayer mode with other players and or AI, in this fast paced sci-fi shooter.

name: The Adventures of Herbie & Katt LeChatt
description: Cats, Crime & Comedy, delivered in a stylish, old school point n' click fashion!

name: Angry Angry Shark
description: Play with friends against endless waves of man eater sharks.

name: Cave Nightmare
description: Cave Nightmare - A top-down horror game where the player, avoiding encounters with monsters, must collect all the gold on the level in order to open the passage to the next level.

name: Yuro's Fantasy Adventure
description: Hello, everyone, this game engine uses Unity to produce , the player will play the cute little loli bravely rushing into the dungeon, full of many Japanese styles and many incredible interesting creatures , which also contains a lot of funny and interesting interaction.

name: Mesozoikum
description: Mesozoikum is an open-world dinosaur survival game and guides you through the atmospheric world of the Jura.

name: Battle in the City
description: Battle in the city is a top-down shooter inspired by the classic '80s. The objective is to defend your base and face your enemies in 35 different levels, where each map contains different types of terrain and objectives.

name: Rocket Explorer
description: Rocket Explorer is a rocket viewing experience, where you can view the rockets of the world with your own eyes. Also in Virtual Reality! Launch rockets, compare them side by side, and take them apart.

name: Sigurat
description: Shoot, smash and explode your enemies in this space shooter inspired by the golden age of arcade games.

name: Infinite Tournament Paintball
description: Battle your friends on the field in the latest paintball game to hit the market. Infinite Tournament Paintball is an online, multiplayer, team based game that includes all the aspects of actually being on the field. Choose from a library of field layouts including speedball, hyperball, and scenario style gameplay.

name: The Cabin
description: The Cabin is 2D Survival and Resource management game were your simple goal is to survive as long as possible. Deep in the Canadian Boreal after some kind of unknown 'incident' you've fled for safety, now scavenge for supplies, battle the elements and evade the mysterious 'augs'.

name: Robin Hood: Winds of Freedom
description: Help Robin Hood and his merry men rescue King Richard from a cunning kidnapper! With its cast of timeless characters, rollicking story of heroism and addictive gameplay, Robin Hood: Winds of Freedom can turn hours of idle time into a quest for fun!

name: Travel Fanz
description: Manage Tourists as they explore maps of real world locations. Build a great travel experience. Discover cultural and natural Attractions. Keep them fed at Restaurants and rest them in Hotels. Discover many places you might never have heard of. Have a great trip!!

name: Vitatio 3
description: VITATIO 3 brings a new take on the precision game genre, traverse your physics based ship through the asteroid belt in this infinite running score based avoidance game, upgrade your ship, unlock new paint jobs and customize your cockpit

name: Bunker Defense
description: Bunker Defense is a tower defense game for 1-4 players. Waves of enemies attack your base, and you must defend it by building different kinds of defenses.

name: Uranus
description: Uranus is a kaleidoscopic audiovisual playscape. It features procedural audio (input-based music) and visuals (systemic color scheme) and was designed to be experienced not only through play, but also live group viewings as a spectator.

name: HangTogether
description: Its Hangman, but with your Friends... Hopefully.

name: Kingso
description: Kingso is not just a medieval 2D strategy, but a very complex game in terms of realistic mechanics where absolutely no one knows what will happen next. Each campaign can be so unpredictable that it becomes unique compared to others.

name: La Dimensione Interna
description: La Dimensione Interna (The Dimension Within) is a third person 3D narrative adventure game in which you'll play as Giorgio, a journalist living in a small town in Tuscany, Italy, during his worse moment in life.

name: Beyond the Gates
description: Beyond The Gates is a 1-4 player online co-op horror which mainly focuses on the storyline. Discover the truth behind a dark mystery that has been hidden until now.

name: Railroad Engineer
description: You build railroads, drive trains, collect resources, deliver goods, and watch cities grow.

name: The Worst Game Ever
description: Utilize just a grappling hook and wall jumping to adventure through a near-to-impossible parkour maze. With no checkpoints and lava floor, your every move counts because once you touch the lava, you restart at the beginning. Challenge yourself by making the game even worse with hardcore controls.

name: Elemental Angel
description: "Elemental Angel" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter plane to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Star Puzzle
description: A beautiful puzzle game in which you collect pieces into a whole picture, choosing between difficulty levels and dozens of levels, improving your skills, limited time and lives.

name: The Whispering Valley
description: Explore a sinister village and solve complex puzzles in The Whispering Valley, a story-driven point & click game. Delve into the horror of guilt and depression to investigate the village's deepest secret.

name: Great Song's Records of Economy
description: Great Song's Records of Economy is a simulation game based on Northern Song Dynasty. Player will act as a itinerant, and bargain with merchants around the country. Besides, player can listen to residents and look for business oppotunities. Lastly, establish own business empire and compose legendary.

name: The test of beauty
description: This is just a 3D Spot the Difference game! There is nothing special in this game, except pretty girls, accurate models, high-definition screen and sometimes less dress up etc...

name: The World We Saved
description: The World We Saved is an environment simulation role-playing game. Your mission is simple: Survive and help others survive. Will you help us grow food, avoid the bad weather, and convince others to join our mission?

name: Zombardment
description: How far can you go in stopping these vicious creatures from spawning. Play loads of levels and endless waves in this Top Down Action Packed Shooter game. Explore, Survive, Earn and Spend.
